Get Url List By Category

Source: R/getUrlList.R
getUrlList.Rd

Get naver news titles and links from target url.

getUrlList(turl = url, col = c("titles", "links"))

Arguments

turl

is target url naver news.

col

is what you want to get from news. Defualt is all.

Value

a [tibble][tibble::tibble-package]

Examples

 # \donttest{
  print(cate_list_url_ex)
#> [1] "https://news.naver.com/main/list.nhn?mode=LS2D&mid=shm&sid2=230&sid1=105&date=20190514"
  getUrlList(cate_list_url_ex)
